name: Rise and Shine Bokeh Overlays
description:
Rise and Shine Bokeh Overlays are a fun, colorful way to add that extra dimension to your images.  Use them for a bit of flair, a bit of texture, or a bit of color.  Change the blending mode and opacity to get your image just the way you want it!

This set comes with 20 hi-res bokeh overlays, ready to use with any editing software that allows the use of layers -- compatible with PS and PSE.

Copyright Rise and Shine Actions, 2013.

Actions compatible with PS CS2-CS6 and PSE6-11.
Overlays compatible with PS & PSE -- requires editing software that allows the use of layers.

Actions, overlays & textures are not to be re-sold or transferred. Action, overlay & texture purchasers can use downloaded items on personal or business photographs to be printed, sold, used in web media, or provided to clients.

Due to the digital nature of this product, no refunds will be given.

Website: www.riseandshineactions.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/riseandshineactions
Twitter: @risenshineatn
Review: http://www.thetoglist.com/listings/rise-and-shine-photoshop-actions/
Blog: www.riseandshineactions.wordpress.com
Beck's Photography Website: www.beckmccormickphotography.com

name: EVENING Sky Overlay Mini Set
description:
Your favorite sunset images from the Rise and Shine Sky Overlay Collection are here!  Use these overlays to swap out boring skies and turn your image into a stunning, memorable photograph with these lovely warm tones.  Easy peasy additions to your image, you can kick back and relax like it's the end of your day!

This mini set contains FIVE hi-res images.

BONUS:

*Action Set - contains 18 helper actions to modify and complete your image with the included overlays, PS CS2-CS6 and PSE 6-11 compatible; contains items to blur, sharpen, saturate, desaturate, add flares and gorgeous color to your image!

*Tutorials - contains two tutorials that show you how to add an overlay to your image

Copyright Rise and Shine Actions, 2013.

Actions compatible with PS CS2-CS6 and PSE6-11.
Overlays compatible with PS & PSE -- requires editing software that allows the use of layers.

Actions, overlays & textures are not to be re-sold or transferred. Action, overlay & texture purchasers can use downloaded items on personal or business photographs to be printed, sold, used in web media, or provided to clients.

Due to the digital nature of this product, no refunds will be given.

description:
Beautiful, fantastic, dreamy skies -- IMAGINE changing out your blah sky to one of these gorgeous babies!  This set features the tried and true colorful favorites from the Rise and Shine Sky Overlay Collection that make you feel like you're entering a dreamland reminiscent of cotton candy and relaxing pink & purple tones.

This mini set contains FIVE hi-res images.

name: MOODY Sky Overlay Mini Set
description:
Looking for a way to add that moody look to your image?  Swap your sky for one of these overlays.  These gray, angry clouds add the right amount of attitude -- use them to change out a blown-out sky, or just add more drama.  The MOODY Sky Overlay Mini Set contains the top five broody images from the Rise and Shine Sky Overlay Collection.

This mini set contains FIVE hi-res images.

name: One-Click Vintage
description:
Get the vintage look you've been trying to achieve in your editing with one click!  This action gives you an amazing aged, vintage tone in your images with a very subtle vignette.  Perfect for images in an urban or outdoor setting.  Layers are pre-adjusted, but unflattened so that you can adjust to suit your own tastes.  Available as a single action for a limited time!  

All Actions & Textures are Copyright Rise and Shine Actions, 2013.

Compatible with PS CS2-CS6 and PSE6-11.

name: The Aurora Collection
description:
Introducing the Aurora Collection, inspired by the Northern and Southern lights!  My inspiration in developing actions is the world around me, places and sights that I've seen or can't wait to see.  I've always wanted to see the Northern and Southern lights, and hope that one day, I'll be able to do that. Until then, this action set will have me dreaming of those beautiful colors in the sky!  

The Aurora Collection is a set of 10 actions with fully adjustable layers, and 8 different textures.  The colors that you'll find in the actions and textures are similar to what you might see in the sky: vibrant, flowy, and gorgeous.  Choose how dramatic or subtle you want the effects to be.  The Aurora Collection is the perfect way to add a bit of color to your images after you've already made your basic adjustments.

All Actions & Textures are Copyright Rise and Shine Actions, 2013.

Compatible with PS CS2-CS6 and PSE6-11.

Actions & textures are not to be re-sold or transferred. Action & texture purchasers can use actions on personal or business photographs to be printed, sold, used in web media, or provided to clients.

name: Rise and Shine Action Set I by Rise and Shine Actions
description:
Rise & Shine is the first action set to be released!  This action set started as a way to add a little more color to images when lighting conditions were not optimal.  Have you ever taken a shot, and thought to yourself, "This would be awesome with a flare in it..." or "I wish that the lighting was more golden..."  Worry a little less with this action set -- you'll love the effect it gives your photographs!

Here’s a list of actions you will receive in the Rise & Shine Action Set purchase:

Sun Play Left
Sun Play Right
Sun Play Subtle Flare Left
Sun Play Subtle Flare Right
Autumn Sun Flare Left
Autumn Sun Flare Right
Golden Glow
Cotton Candy Twilight
Quarter Til Midnight
Fiery Skies
Warm Summer's Eve
Aurora Borealis

All Actions & Textures are Copyright Rise and Shine Actions, 2013.

name: Rise and Shine Action Set II by Rise and Shine Actions
description:
Rise and Shine II is the sequel set to Rise and Shine I.  The original Rise and Shine set was such a big hit that I had to do a second one, and there's probably no stopping with this one, either!  Rise and Shine II adds subtle, fun colors to your images and are fully adjustable.  Note that it's not ONLY the opacity that is adjustable, but also the blending mode -- although I've chosen the mode that I prefer for each individual action, you are free to make the determination yourself!  The possibilities are endless with this set!

You'll find the following actions in this set:
Garnet & Gold Skies
Harvest Skies
Gemstone
Bohemian Haze
Smoky Skies
Dusky Blue Skies

name: I'll Drink to That! Action Set by Rise and Shine Actions
description:
We all need a good drink sometimes.  I'll Drink to That! is an action set inspired by wines and beers that will add tones to your images that you'd expect to find in your glass.  In this action set, you'll find:

Merlot
Zinfandel 
Shiraz
Champagne 
Pinot Grigio
Imperial Stout 
Brown Ale 
Amber Ale 
Double IPA 
Hefeweizen 
Pale Ale 

Plus, I added a few fun extras, too!

Bonus Actions:
Corked
Bubbly

When you're finished with this one, get ready for another round!

name: Another Round Action Set by Rise and Shine Actions
description:
Are you ready for another round?  This one's on me!  Another Round is the sequel action set to I'll Drink to That! and is for the folks that prefer a mixed drink instead of a cold beer or glass of wine.  Another Round is a fun take on drinks we all know and love.  You'll find 13 fully adjustable actions in this set...some of them with extra options!  (Not everyone likes their martinis with an olive...and just in case you'd like your Lynchburg lemonade in a Mason jar, you get that option, too!)

This set includes:

Mojito

Martini (with olive)

name: Auto-Matte-ic Awesome Matte Action Set by Rise and Shine Actions
description:
I’m a huge fan of the matte effect in my photos, so I thought that this would be a great addition to my own personal collection.  I did a lot of research to find the best way to give a matte effect to my images, and you’ll find that specific method in this set!  I thought that it might be fun to give some color to these matte effects, too.  My first inclination was to go with lighter, pastel colors, but I quickly discovered that darker, bold colors would give great tones to your matted image.  The result?  More options!!  The lighter colors give a subtle little something-something to your image, while the bold colors give a little more oomph.  I think you’ll love these actions, and the light, airy feeling it creates!

In this action set, you’ll find:

A basic matte with no color
Electric Blue matte
Baby Blues matte
Mellow Yellow matte
Lemony Yellow matte
Spring Green matte
Grassy Green matte
Flushed Pink matte
Razzle Dazzle Pink matte
Dreamsicle Orange matte
Tangerine Orange matte
Purple Amethyst matte
Purple Plum matte
Silvery Gray matte
Rainy Day Gray matte
Milky Matte

The opacity on these actions has been pre-adjusted to my own tastes, but is fully adjustable to your own...both with the level of matte you prefer in your image, and the level of color that you'd like to add.  :)

All Actions & Textures are Copyright Rise and Shine Actions, 2013.

Compatible with PS CS2-CS6 and PSE6-11.

Actions & textures are not to be re-sold or transferred.  Action & texture purchasers can use actions on personal or business photographs to be printed, sold, used in web media, or provided to clients.

Due to the digital nature of this product, no refunds will be given.

name: Viva Las Vegas Action & Texture Set by Rise and Shine Actions
description:
What do you think of when Las Vegas is on your mind?  

Las Vegas is a hodge-podge of so many different things, flavors from around the world, and shows to suit everyone's tastes.  When I think of Vegas, so much comes to mind: sharp, bright neon signs; vintage and desert tones; gorgeous sunsets; hotels, casinos and hazy smoke.  Las Vegas is like sensory overload.  The Viva Las Vegas action and texture set takes inspiration from all of things you'll see when you visit Las Vegas and rolls it into an easy way to edit your photos with a little bit of flare.

In this set, you'll find 11 actions:

A sharpening action to bring out the details in your image
The Boneyard, where neon signs hang out in their final resting place (with "Old Signs" and "Faded" as options)
The Vegas Strip
Neon Sign
Elvis (with the Blue Suede Shoes option)
Casino (with the Smoky option)
Planet Hollywood
Circus Circus
Little White Chapel (with the Wedding Bells option)
Mandalay Bay
The Venetian

There are also 5 textures included in this set that can be used with, or without, the Viva Las Vegas actions:

Cirque
In the Desert
Las Vegas Strip
Red Rock
Sin City

All Actions & Textures are Copyright Rise and Shine Actions, 2013.

Compatible with PS CS2-CS6 and PSE6-11.

Actions & textures are not to be re-sold or transferred.  Action & texture purchasers can use actions on personal or business photographs to be printed, sold, used in web media, or provided to clients.

Due to the digital nature of this product, no refunds will be given.

name: Way Back When Black & White Action Set by Rise and Shine Actions
description:
Ever listen to a story that started off with "Way back when..." and start thinking about way back when?  I always think of black and white television sets and old classics.  The Way Back When action set is a set of adjustable black and white actions that will make you think about what life was like...way back when.  There are 13 actions in this set, but Faded Memories and Chocolate offer three different options each to give your black and white image a little tone.

In addition to Faded Memories and Chocolate, you'll also find various options for black and white actions...some more Dramatic (that's one of them!) and some more Light and Airy (that's an action, too!).  

The actions included in this set are:
Extra, extra!
Timeless Beauty
Moody
Salt & Pepper
Faded Memories
Chocolate
Indigo
Tuxedo
Old Movie
Charlie Chaplin
Organic B&W
Dramatic
